${modID}:Dodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block, apply !M! weak to the enemy
${modID}:Dodge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block, apply !M! weak to the enemy

${modID}:HiddenStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply !M! vulnerable to the enemy

${modID}:Tumble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Dexterity NL if there is no modbynth233:Buffer , then gain modbynth233:缓冲

${modID}:Chance.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy does not intend to attack, NL draw 2 cards NL Ethereal
${modID}:Chance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy does not intend to attack, NL gain [E], draw 2 cards NL Ethereal

${modID}:Rope.NAME: Rope

${modID}:Rope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage，apply !M! modbynth233:Constricted to the enemy

${modID}:Net.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! modbynth233:Constricted to ALL enemy and apply !M! Weak to them NL Exhaust

${modID}:Refresh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Dexterity, Gain !M! modbynth233:Blur NL Zero your Dexterity if it is below zero

${modID}:Rise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! N damage (N equals of the number of Dexterity stacks), lose 1 Dexterity

${modID}:Recall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! exhausted cards, add them to your hand NL Exhaust

${modID}:Dispose.NAME: Less is More

${modID}:Dispose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card NL Gain !M! + N Dexterity (N equals to the cost of the exhausted card) NL Draw 1 card

${modID}:Flaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL If the enemy intends to attack, you gain !M! Dexterity

${modID}:DummyAction.NAME: Dummy Action

${modID}:DummyAction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Gain !M! Dexterity NL Lose !M! Dexterity at the end of your turn

${modID}:TurnAroundStrike.NAME: Turn Around Strike

${modID}:TurnAroundStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw !M! card(s), discard 1 card

${modID}:Test.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL modbynth233:chain 3, if not chained, add a modbynth233:Chance+ to your hand

${modID}:Reflect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add Oridnary Form to your exhausted pile NL Shuffle a modbynth233:Recall+ to your draw pile NL Exhaust

${modID}:HurryStrike.NAME: Hurry Strike

${modID}:HurryStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemy NL Exhaust 1 card at random NL Randomize this card's damage and set it as its new base damage

${modID}:Prejudgement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, you gain !M! [E] , draw !M! cards, gain !B! block

${modID}:Armor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If your Dexterity is not negative, Lose 1 Dexterity , Gain !M! Plated Armor

${modID}:Trick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards from your discard pile if it is not empty

${modID}:Plan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, choose 1 card from your hand and put it onto the top of draw pile

${modID}:Prelude.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards NL Gain 2 Dexterity NL Innate , Exhaust

${modID}:Concentrate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity NL Draw 1 less card next turn NL Exhaust

${modID}:Tighten.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Quadruple the modbynth233:Constricted of the enemy NL Exhaust

${modID}:Idea.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable NL When Exhausted , Gain [E] [E] [E] and draw 2 cards

${modID}:DoppelgangerTinclad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain X + !M! [E] and draw X + !M! cards NL exhausted

${modID}:SwiftStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !B! damage !M! times. NL Damage of this card is affected with Dexterity instead of Strength

${modID}:PerfectStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 6 damage. Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike"

${modID}:Practice.NAME: Practice

${modID}:Transfer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Dexterity , gain !M! strength NL Exhausted

${modID}:Rest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! N HP (N equals to the number of Dexterity), lose half of your Dexterity NL Exhausted

${modID}:Insult.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! strength to the enemy, Stun NL Exhausted

${modID}:Bump.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, deal additional damage equals to the stacks of your Thorn

${modID}:Elegy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP, and the enemy lose !D! HP

${modID}:Innovation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards, add !M! random cards to your hand NL Exhausted

${modID}:Morale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double the damage of your next attack, Retain

${modID}:Charge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The following !M! attack cards you play will be free

${modID}:Flashback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: add a modbynth233:Nostalgia to your exhausted pile, shuffle a modbynth233:Recall+ into your draw pile NL Exhaust
